short.ar: باستخدام بندقية القناصة الخاصة بك ، عليك القضاء على جميع الأعداء دون أن يلاحظك أحد.
short.am: በጠመንጃህ ጠላቶቹን በሙሉ ሳታስተውል ማጥፋት አለብህ ።
short.bg: С твоята снайперска пушка трябва да елиминираш всички врагове, без да те забелязват.
short.bn: আপনার স্নাইপার রাইফেল দিয়ে, আপনাকে লক্ষ্য না করেই সমস্ত শত্রুদের নির্মূল করতে হবে।
short.ca: Amb el teu rifle de franctirador, has d'eliminar tots els enemics sense que et notin.
short.cs: S odstřelovací puškou musíte eliminovat všechny nepřátele, aniž byste si toho všimli.
short.da: Med din snigskytteriffel skal du eliminere alle fjenderne uden at blive bemærket.
short.de: Mit deinem Scharfschützengewehr musst du alle Feinde eliminieren, ohne bemerkt zu werden.
short.el: Με το τουφέκι ελεύθερου σκοπευτή σας, πρέπει να εξαλείψετε όλους τους εχθρούς χωρίς να παρατηρήσετε.
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,lt,pt_BR,pt_: With your sniper rifle, you have to eliminate all the enemies without being noticed.
short.es: Con tu rifle de francotirador, tienes que eliminar a todos los enemigos sin que te noten.
short.et: Oma snaiper vintpüssiga peate kõrvaldama kõik vaenlased, ilma et neid märgataks.
short.fa: با تفنگ تیرانداز از خفا خود را, شما باید برای از بین بردن تمام دشمنان بدون اینکه متوجه.
short.fi: Sniper-kiväärilläsi sinun on poistettava kaikki viholliset huomaamatta.
short.fil: Gamit ang iyong mamamaril na nakatago rifle, mayroon kang upang maalis ang lahat ng mga kaaway nang hindi napapansin.
short.fr: Avec votre fusil de sniper, vous devez éliminer tous les ennemis sans vous faire remarquer.
short.gu: તમારી સ્નાઈપર રાઇફલથી, તમારે ધ્યાન આપ્યા વિના બધા દુશ્મનોનો નાશ કરવો પડશે.
short.he: עם רובה הצלפים שלך, אתה צריך לחסל את כל האויבים מבלי שיבחינו בך.
short.hi: अपने स्नाइपर राइफल के साथ, आप ध्यान दिया जा रहा है बिना सभी दुश्मनों को खत्म करने के लिए है।
short.hr: Sa snajperskom puškom, moraš eliminirati sve neprijatelje bez da te primijete.
short.hu: Mesterlövész puskáddal el kell távolítanod az összes ellenséget anélkül, hogy észrevennéd.
short.id: Dengan senapan sniper Anda, Anda harus melenyapkan semua musuh tanpa diketahui.
short.it: Con il tuo fucile da cecchino, devi eliminare tutti i nemici senza essere notato.
short.ja: あなたのスナイパーライフルで、あなたは気づかれることなくすべての敵を排除する必要があります。
short.kn: ನಿಮ್ಮ ಸ್ನೈಪರ್ ರೈಫಲ್ ನಿಂದ, ನೀವು ಗಮನಿಸದೆ ಎಲ್ಲಾ ಶತ್ರುಗಳನ್ನು ತೊಡೆದುಹಾಕಬೇಕು.
short.ko: 저격 소총을 사용하면 눈치 채지 않고 모든 적을 제거해야합니다.
short.lv: Ar savu snaipera šauteni jums ir jālikvidē visi ienaidnieki, nemanot.
short.ml: നിങ്ങളുടെ സ്നൈപ്പർ റൈഫിൾ ഉപയോഗിച്ച്, നിങ്ങൾ ശ്രദ്ധിക്കപ്പെടാതെ എല്ലാ ശത്രുക്കളെയും ഉന്മൂലനം ചെയ്യണം.
short.mr: आपल्या स्नायपर रायफलने लक्षात न येता सर्व शत्रूंचा नायनाट करावा लागतो.
short.ms: Dengan senapang sniper anda, anda perlu menghapuskan semua musuh tanpa disedari.
short.nl: Met je sluipschuttersgeweer moet je alle vijanden onopgemerkt uitschakelen.
short.no: Med snikskytterriflen din må du eliminere alle fiender uten å bli lagt merke til.
short.pl: Za pomocą karabinu snajperskiego musisz wyeliminować wszystkich wrogów, nie będąc zauważonym.
short.ro: Cu lunetist pușcă, va trebui să elimine toți dușmanii fără a fi observat.
short.ru: С помощью снайперской винтовки вы должны уничтожить всех врагов, не будучи замеченными.
short.sk: So svojou ostreľovacou puškou musíte eliminovať všetkých nepriateľov bez toho, aby ste si to všimli.
short.sl: S svojo ostrostrelko moraš odpraviti vse sovražnike, ne da bi jih opazili.
short.sv: Med ditt prickskyttegevär måste du eliminera alla fiender utan att märkas.
short.sw: Na bunduki yako sniper, una kuondoa maadui wote bila kuwa niliona.
short.ta: உங்கள் துப்பாக்கி சுடும் துப்பாக்கி மூலம், நீங்கள் கவனிக்கப்படாமல் அனைத்து எதிரிகளையும் அகற்ற வேண்டும்.
short.te: మీ స్నిపర్ రైఫిల్ తో, మీరు గమనించకుండా శత్రువులందరినీ నిర్మూలించాలి.
short.th: ด้วยปืนไรเฟิลซุ่มยิงของคุณคุณต้องกําจัดศัตรูทั้งหมดโดยไม่ถูกสังเกตเห็น
short.tr: Keskin nişancı tüfeğinizle, fark edilmeden tüm düşmanları ortadan kaldırmanız gerekir.
short.uk: За допомогою вашої снайперської гвинтівки ви повинні ліквідувати всіх ворогів, не будучи поміченими.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,et,fa,fi,f:
Get ready to defeat your enemies with a scoped weapon in the middle of the desert! Take your best shot and defeat all your enemies. Top sniper players start the game on the roof of a building. They destroy enemies far from the roof with a sniper rifle. As a good sniper assassin, you must go down from the roof to destroy the enemies in places that cannot be seen with binoculars. When you set foot on the ground, you must destroy all the enemies in this fps game before your enemies notice you. 

Since you have a small number of bullets, it will be the right choice for you to shoot a single shot while shooting. Among the sniper games, you can both move with your fps character and shoot from far distances in this game. If you like war games, it is possible to enjoy this sniper elite game more.

How To Play
You can move your fps game character around with the arrow keys. You can use the arrow keys to pass obstacles such as stairs. Using the right mouse button, you can open binoculars with the sniper rifle and shoot at your opponents. To make long-range shots, you can zoom in and out of the sniper's binoculars with the wheel in the middle of your mouse.

Sniper Gun Shooting Game Features
✓ Realistic graphics
✓ 3D level designer
✓ Realistic particle
✓ Advance control

Finally, you can enjoy these game for free (and more requests will be added)! Sniper Gun Shooting Game extension does not contain any hidden ads.

Help and Contact
Contact with us at info@gamebol.com and share your thoughts and problems.
